skill1.name: Lightning Thrust
skill1.longDsc: Kenshin dashes with his katana, infused with the spark of lightning, dealing 15 DMG to single target.

skill2.name: Bolt of Lightning
skill2.longDsc: Kenshin calls the god of thunder, summoning lightning strike and dealing 20 DMG to all enemies.

skill3.name: Let The Lightning Guide Me
skill3.shortDsc: Utility | Self | All CD -1 | All DMG + 5
skill3.longDsc: Kenshin is focusing all his energy to deplet combat exhaustion [All CD -1] and to boost his stamina and strength [All DMG +5] till the end of the combat

skill4.name: Spark Step
skill4.longDsc: Kenshin is preparing to Evade next [1] DMG instance. He is covering his body and katana in sparks making it Hidden and unable to detect by an enemy
